name: Vaadin.GridColumnGroupElement

properties.name: resizable
properties.description: When set to true, the column is user-resizable.

properties.name: frozen
properties.description:
When true, the column is frozen. When a column inside of a column group is frozen,
all of the sibling columns inside the group will get frozen also.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: When set to true, the cells for this column are hidden.

properties.name: flexGrow
properties.description: Flex grow ratio for the column group as the sum of the ratios of its child columns.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the column group as the sum of the widths of its child columns.

description:
A `<vaadin-grid-column-group>` is used to make groups of columns in `<vaadin-grid>` and
to configure additional headers and footers.

Groups can be nested to create complex header and footer configurations.

The `class` attribute is used to differentiate header and footer templates.

#### Example:
```html
<vaadin-grid-column-group resizable>
 <template class="header">Name</template>

 <vaadin-grid-column>
   <template class="header">First</template>
   <template>[[item.name.first]]</template>
 </vaadin-grid-column>
 <vaadin-grid-column>
   <template class="header">Last</template>
   <template>[[item.name.last]]</template>
 </vaadin-grid-column>
</vaadin-grid-column-group>
```
